entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -40.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -40.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -44.9°C
Wind: NNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 33.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h this morning. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 49 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 45.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 45. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
